旐字的基本解释

旐
zhào
古代的一种旗子，上面画着龟蛇：“龟蛇为旐。”
引魂幡：“飞旐翩以启路。”

旐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhào］
［《廣韻》治小切，上小，澄。］
(1)古代画有龟蛇图象的旗。
(2)丧事用的一种魂幡。

旐字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【方字部】　旐； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页484第12
【唐韻】治小切【集韻】【韻會】直紹切，?音肇。【說文】龜蛇四游，以象營室，游游而長。【釋名】龜蛇爲旐。旐，兆也。龜知氣兆之吉凶，建之於後，察度事宜之形兆也。【詩·小雅】設此旐矣。【周禮·春官·司常】龜蛇爲旐。【又】縣鄙建旐。【註】龜蛇，象其扞難避害也。　又【爾雅·釋天】緇廣充幅長尋曰旐。【註】帛全幅，長八尺者也。【禮·檀弓】綢練設旐夏也。【註】旌之旒緇布廣充幅長尋曰旐。

古代的一种旗子。

banner
Basic explanation of words
banner
zhào
An ancient flag with a tortoise and snake painted on it: "The tortoise and the snake are despised."
The soul-catching flag: "Fly to start the road."
banner
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhào］
["Guangyun" treats small cuts, upper small, clear. ]
(1) Ancient flags with images of turtles and snakes.
(2) A kind of soul flags used in funerals.
banner

【Mao Jixia】【Fangzi Department】　旐; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 484-12
[Tang Yun] Zhi Xiaoqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Zhi Shaoqie, sound Zhao. [Said the text] The tortoise and the snake swim four times, in the elephant camp room, swimming for a long time. [Release name] Turtle and snake are 旐. Hey, Zhao Ye. The tortoise knows the auspicious and bad omens of qi, it is built on the back, and it is also the omens to observe the matter. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Set up this 旐矣. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Sichang】Turtles and snakes are despised. [Also] The county looks down on Jian'an. [Note] Turtles and snakes are like their defenses.　[Erya·Shitian] Guangguang looked for a long time and said, 旐. [Note] The silk is full and eight feet long. 【Li·Tan Gong】Silk practice is set up in summer. [Note] Jing Zhi's 旒缁缁缁缁漁旐弁旐讓藐旐藐藐旐 for a long time.
